overview: Riding the world wide web takes on a whole new meaning in this sexy story of online voyeurism. Bill and Jed thought they were making big strides in the adult dot-com business, but when things went awry, they needed to find a cheap way to stream their sexy footage to waiting viewers. By illegally using the satellite, they become the target of the law, but they are also incredibly popular. Their zesty site "Hollywood Swingers" is really fun and soon they are at the top of their game again!
tagline: We All Want What We Can't Have
title: Hollywood Swingers
